net.co.java.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The server is the main class for the Conquer Online server. It initialzes one GameServer and one AuthServer.
    Author:
    Thomas Gmelig Meyling, Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Server.AuthServer
      The Authentication Server handles user login requests and allows the client to connect to the Game Server.
      class  Server.GameServer
      The game server contains all required data for the entities and ensures that updates of these data - for example equipment or location - are efficiently broadcasted to all the connected clients.
      static class  Server.Map
      The Map enum contains all Maps for the current Server Map can be accessed by name (Map.CentralPlain) or id (1002).
